keyInsights.title: Essential Features (Must Have)
keyInsights.description: Features present in 3+ competitors - baseline expectations

keyInsights.title: Unique Features (Competitive Advantage)
keyInsights.description: Features unique to OrderFi - competitive differentiation opportunities

recommendations.current_problem: Most POS systems have overcomplicated interfaces with 50+ features cluttering the experience
recommendations.orderfi_solution: Focus on 5 core workflows: Order, Pay, Cook, Serve, Analyze
recommendations.implementation: Single-screen workflows, progressive disclosure, voice-first interface with ChatOps automation

recommendations.current_problem: Traditional POS systems are desktop-centric with poor mobile experience and tiny touch targets
recommendations.orderfi_solution: Native mobile experience with gesture controls and one-handed operation optimized for restaurant environments
recommendations.implementation: Touch-optimized UI (44px+ targets), swipe navigation, voice commands, haptic feedback, glassmorphism design

recommendations.current_problem: Delayed updates between kitchen, front-of-house, and customers create operational inefficiencies
recommendations.orderfi_solution: Real-time sync across all touchpoints with WebSocket connections and live status updates
recommendations.implementation: Live kitchen display, instant order updates, real-time inventory, customer order tracking

recommendations.current_problem: Manual processes for ordering, inventory management, and customer service create bottlenecks
recommendations.orderfi_solution: Conversational AI for orders, predictive inventory, automated customer service with ChatOps
recommendations.implementation: ChatOps for restaurant management, AI menu recommendations, smart reordering, voice-first ordering

recommendations.current_problem: High payment processing fees (2.9%+) and slow settlement times (2-3 days) hurt restaurant margins
recommendations.orderfi_solution: Native crypto payments with instant settlement and loyalty tokens, reducing fees to <1%
recommendations.implementation: USDC payments, MIMI loyalty tokens, DeFi integration for treasury management, Web3 wallet integration

recommendations.current_problem: Static interfaces that don't adapt to restaurant context, peak hours, or staff capabilities
recommendations.orderfi_solution: Dynamic interface that adapts to time of day, order volume, staff levels, and customer preferences
recommendations.implementation: Contextual gesture zones, adaptive layouts, smart notifications, predictive actions

architecturalRecommendations.implementation: Separate Kitchen, Customer, Admin, and Analytics modules
Order service, Payment service, Inventory service, Analytics service
PostgreSQL for transactions, Redis for real-time, TimescaleDB for analytics
Socket.io for real-time order updates, kitchen display sync, customer notifications

architecturalRecommendations.recommended_state: Multi-model AI architecture with specialized agents
architecturalRecommendations.implementation: GPT-4 for conversation, Claude for analysis, local models for simple tasks

nextSteps: Implement simplified mobile-first interface with 5 core workflows
Build real-time WebSocket architecture for instant updates
Develop contextual AI agents for automated restaurant management
Create blockchain payment infrastructure with USDC integration
Design adaptive UI that responds to restaurant context and peak hours
Build microservices architecture for independent scaling and deployment
